forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder is possible late. Low 14C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Thunder is possible late. Low 57F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. It will be windy at times, especially early. High near 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Thunder possible. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp late. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
